text: Beka Gorgadze (born 8 February 1996) is a Georgian rugby union player. His position is flanker, and he currently plays for Bordeaux in the Top 14 and the Georgia national team.http://au.eurosport.com/rugby/beka- gorgadze_prs396904/person.shtml ==References== Category:Rugby union players from Georgia (country) Category:Living people Category:1996 births Category:Georgia international rugby union players
title: Beka Gorgadze
